item.title: Container Implementation
item.description: Container Implementation Details The following is relevant for the implementation of model containers in different languages. Model containers must implement functionality consistent with this information. Socket Creation Create a ZeroMQ Dealer socket. This socket can receive requests and send responses asynchronously. Python example: import zmq context = zmq.Context(); socket = context.socket(zmq.DEALER) Initializing a Connection Once a ZeroMQ Dealer socket has been created, use it to connect to Clipper.
